cold_call.greeting: Hi there! This is {{agent_name}} from {{company_name}}. How are you today?
cold_call.pitch: I noticed you might be interested in {{service_type}}. We've been helping businesses in {{location}} with {{value_proposition}}. Would you like to hear more about how we could help you?
value_props: I understand you're busy, so I'll be brief.
We've helped similar businesses increase their {{metric}} by {{percentage}}%.
What sets us apart is our {{unique_feature}}.

objection_handling.not_interested: I completely understand. Would it be okay if I send you some information for future reference?
objection_handling.too_busy: Of course, I respect your time. When would be a better time to have a quick chat?
objection_handling.too_expensive: I understand budget concerns. We actually offer flexible plans that can work with different budgets.
objection_handling.already_have_provider: That's great! I'd still love to share how we might complement your current setup.

closing.positive: Excellent! Let's schedule a quick meeting to discuss the details. What works better for you, morning or afternoon?
closing.neutral: I'll send you some information about our services. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
closing.negative: Thank you for your time. Have a great rest of your day!

cold_call.no_response: I understand you're busy. I'll follow up with an email with more information. Have a great day!

follow_up_email.subject: Quick follow-up from our conversation - {{company_name}}
follow_up_email.body:
Hi {{contact_name}},

Thank you for taking the time to speak with me earlier. As promised, I wanted to share more information about how {{company_name}} can help your business.

We specialize in {{service_description}} and have helped many businesses in {{location}} achieve {{benefit}}.

You can learn more about our services at {{website}} or give us a call at {{phone}}.

Would you be interested in a quick 15-minute chat to discuss how we can help your business?

Best regards,
{{agent_name}}
{{company_name}}

cold_call.greeting: Hi! This is {{agent_name}} from {{company_name}}. I hope I caught you at a good time?
cold_call.pitch: I work with restaurants in {{location}} to help them attract more customers and increase their online presence. I noticed your restaurant might benefit from our digital marketing services. Would you be interested in learning how we've helped other restaurants increase their bookings?
value_props: We've helped restaurants increase their online orders by up to 40%
Our clients typically see a 25% boost in weekend reservations
We can help you stand out on food delivery platforms

objection_handling.not_interested: I understand. Would you like to receive our restaurant marketing guide? It's free and full of actionable tips.
objection_handling.too_busy: I know running a restaurant keeps you busy. When would be a better time to chat?
objection_handling.too_expensive: We have flexible plans designed specifically for restaurants of all sizes.
objection_handling.already_have_provider: That's great! We actually specialize in complementing existing marketing efforts.

cold_call.greeting: Hello! This is {{agent_name}} with {{company_name}}. Is this a good time?
cold_call.pitch: I help retail stores in {{location}} increase their foot traffic and online sales. I noticed your store might benefit from our local marketing services. Would you like to hear how we've helped similar stores grow their customer base?
value_props: We've helped stores increase their foot traffic by 30%
Our clients typically see a 35% increase in repeat customers
We can help you compete with online retailers

objection_handling.not_interested: No problem! Would you like our free guide on retail marketing trends?
objection_handling.too_busy: I understand retail is demanding. When would be a better time?
objection_handling.too_expensive: We have plans designed specifically for small retail businesses.
objection_handling.already_have_provider: Great! We actually specialize in complementing existing marketing efforts.

cold_call.greeting: Hi there! This is {{agent_name}} from {{company_name}}. How's your day going?
cold_call.pitch: I help service businesses in {{location}} get more clients through digital marketing. I noticed your business might benefit from our lead generation services. Would you like to hear how we've helped similar businesses grow?
value_props: We've helped service businesses increase their leads by 50%
Our clients typically see a 40% increase in qualified inquiries
We can help you stand out in local search results

objection_handling.not_interested: I understand. Would you like our free guide on service business marketing?
objection_handling.too_busy: I know service businesses are demanding. When would be a better time?
objection_handling.too_expensive: We have plans designed specifically for service businesses of all sizes.
objection_handling.already_have_provider: That's great! We actually specialize in complementing existing marketing efforts.
